meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Polygala, typically with small flowers in shades of blue, purple, or pink.
meanings.sent1: The milkworts in the garden bloomed beautifully this spring.
meanings.sent2: I picked some milkworts to add color to the bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn stash under the milkworts.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as vibrant as a field of blooming milkworts.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the milkworts danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The dried roots of certain species of Polygala, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: Grandma brewed a tea with milkworts to help soothe my cough.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist recommended using milkworts for their healing properties.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistakenly thought the dried milkworts were catnip.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the milkworts filled the room with a sense of calm.
meanings.sent5: The ancient book mentioned the mystical powers of milkworts.
